content:
Effect of amiodarone on cancer outcomes
Incident cancer, our primary outcome of interest, and site-specific cancer, were not collected or reported in any of the 5 included trials. Data on cancer-related deaths were available from the 5 included studies. There was no significant increase in cancer-related death in patients treated with amiodarone vs the comparator (risk ratio 0.96, 95% confidence interval 0.57-1.63; I 2= 0%; Fig.3).
query: amiodarone beta-blockers mortality death cardiovascular outcomes hazard ratio odds ratio
title: Chronic amiodarone use and the risk of cancer: A systematic review and meta-analysis
authors: Lauren A. Siemers, Jenny MacGillivray, Jason G. Andrade, Ricky D. Turgeon
reference: Siemers, L. A., MacGillivray, J., Andrade, J. G., & Turgeon, R. D. (2021). Chronic amiodarone use and the risk of cancer: A systematic review and meta-analysis. CJC Open, 3(1), 109-114. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.cjco.2020.12.012
